We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private SimpleMovingAverage _sma;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_sma = SMA(symbol, period);

// In OnData()
if (_sma.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "SMA Rolling Sum", _sma.RollingSum);
    Plot("My Indicators", "SMA Period", _sma.Period);
    Plot("My Indicators", "SMA Current", _sma.Current);
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.sma = self.SMA(symbol, period)

# In OnData()
if self.sma.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "SMA Rolling Sum", self.sma.RollingSum);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "SMA Period", self.sma.Period);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "SMA Current", self.sma.Current);
